casebody.data:
The LATHAN COMPANY, INC.
v.
The State of Louisiana, DIVISION OF ADMINISTRATION, Office of Facility Planning and Control NO. 2019-CC-0331 Supreme Court of Louisiana. April 29, 2019

Denied.

WEIMER, J., would grant and docket.

GUIDRY, J., would grant and docket.

GENOVESE, J., would grant and docket.
